divs: Sighting DetailsIt was memorial day weekend that Saturday and my husband and I and went to visit some family where we were going to have a BBQ and I was going to lay out back to get some sun with my friend. Well they had to leave unexpectly and told us to relax and make out selves at home. While I was getting ready to lay down my phone accidentlally took a picture of the sky when I noticed what it was I stood up and took another pic in the same direction it revealed a trail of some sort. When I first saw the photos I didn't know what to think but there really wasn't anything to distort the pictures. It was about 2:00 in the afternoon and the sky was clear and it was very warm out. It looks like a blue orb of some sort. I did not see anything with my naked eye it was only visible via my pictures.
Summary: My camera accidental snapped a picture in the sky and a blue orb was in the photo
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Albany
There were no other sightings in Albany on or around May 26th 2012
